translations: n.电灯泡；（植物的）鳞茎，球茎；球状物

phrs.translation: n. 白炽灯泡，白炽灯照
[医]十二指肠冠，十二指肠球部

sentences.sentence: This makes the total cost of the bulb and energy $27.
sentences.translation: 这使得灯泡和电量的总耗费升为$27。

sentences.sentence: On the stairway to the basement, he took the light bulb out of the socket.
sentences.translation: 在通向地下室的楼梯上，他把灯泡从灯座上拧了下来。

sentences.sentence: It is easy to change a light bulb, sure, but it is harder to change the bulb and its fixture.
sentences.translation: 换一个灯泡当然很容易，但是要更换灯泡和其固定装置就比较难了。
